content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the vilnius city district court the court made a final decision regarding the division of matrimonial property the movable property such as a car was awarded to the defendant while the immovable property including a land plot and a dwelling house was awarded to the applicant the court also ordered the applicant to pay the defendant compensation of eur 49'545.86 there was a joint several obligation between the parties towards a creditorial obligation ab but the obligation fund for victims of crime will remain the personal obligation of the defendant the court also addressed the division of debts and the liability of the parties the court considered the defendants alcohol abuse and negative behavior towards the applicant and children in making these decisions the court ordered the defendant to pay maintenance for the minor children and the applicants legal costs the court supported the request to end the marriage and the applicant will retain their married name
